item.title: The Daily Ben — 2026-02-25
item.description: Explore the rapid transformation of AI as it moves from a passive tool to an active workplace teammate, alongside a critical look at the "technological adolescence" and safety challenges facing the industry. This episode also breaks down the deepening housing affordability crisis and covers essential local updates, from high-stakes legal investigations in Cook County to the latest shifts in Illinois politics and professional sports.

item.title: The Daily Ben — 2026-02-25
item.description: Explore how AI is moving from a tool to a teammate in the workplace and why a record number of homebuyers are walking away from deals in an increasingly strained economy. This episode also breaks down the early debates in the 2026 Illinois governor’s race, the complex ideological tensions shaping global affairs with Iran, and the latest highlights from the NBA and MLB spring training.
